## UserConfig.apps property

The `app`<!-- -->s's configurations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
apps: UserAppConfig[];
```

## Remarks

A project can contains multiple `app`<!-- -->s. Different `app`<!-- -->s can be based on different fe frameworks.
